Dependency Information

Apache Maven

<dependency>
  <groupId>org.apache.cactus</groupId>
  <artifactId>cactus-site</artifactId>
  <version>1.8.2-SNAPSHOT</version>
  <type>pom</type>
</dependency>

Apache Buildr

'org.apache.cactus:cactus-site:pom:1.8.2-SNAPSHOT'

Apache Ivy

<dependency org="org.apache.cactus" name="cactus-site" rev="1.8.2-SNAPSHOT">
  <artifact name="cactus-site" type="pom" />
</dependency>

Groovy Grape

@Grapes(
@Grab(group='org.apache.cactus', module='cactus-site', version='1.8.2-SNAPSHOT')
)

Gradle/Grails

compile 'org.apache.cactus:cactus-site:1.8.2-SNAPSHOT'

Scala SBT

libraryDependencies += "org.apache.cactus" % "cactus-site" % "1.8.2-SNAPSHOT"

Leiningen

[org.apache.cactus/cactus-site "1.8.2-SNAPSHOT"]
